content: Is there a way to get the name of a DefId without having to first construct a TyCtxt?
I would expect it to be on https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_metadata/creader/struct.CStore.html somewhere but I don't see it
I guess DefPath::to_string_no_crate_verbose is sort of close? let me try that
ok yay that worked :tada:
